Posts.Content: Jun 7, 2010 01:30PM izziem wrote: This is more a question than a comment.  I just started abraxane/avastin.  My dosing schedule is: I get both drugs once every three weeks .  Anyone else on this type of schedule?  Most of what I've read is every week for 3 weeks and then a week off.  I am also getting this with a steroid even though I've read it is not necessary with the abraxane as opposed to taxol or taxotere.  The steroid makes me feel like Super Women until I crash two days later with severe muscle/joint aches and pain. Anyone else have that side effect on a pain scale of 8-10? Original diagnosis 2001 ER/PR+, 2009 ER/PR+ and Trip Neg tumors.  Faslodex worked for 8 months but last PET showed growth again, bone, liver, chest.
Posts.Title: Anyone on Abraxane/Avastin jneumann anamary1
